title: Business travel
description: Travel between home and the place of exercise of the professional activity or the place of education and training

title: Consultations and care
description: Travel for consultations and care that cannot be provided remotely and cannot be postponed or for the purchase of health products

title: Compelling family reason
description: Travel for compelling family reasons, for assistance to vulnerable or precarious people or for childcare

title: Travel and assistance for the disabled
description: Travel for people with disabilities and their companions

title: Judicial or administrative summons
description: Travel to respond to a judicial or administrative summons

title: General interest missions
description: Travel to participate in missions of general interest at the request of the administrative authority

title: Long-distance travel transits
description: Travel related to transits for long distance trips

title: Pets outing
description: Short trips, within a maximum radius of one kilometer around the home for the needs of pets
